task_descriptions: The life support on your spaceship is failing. To save the lives of the crew, you need to help recover it by working with the spaceship's onboard robot. The life support system is in a locked container that you cannot access personally. The robot must break the lock (manufactured by '`LockManufacturer-1@spaceship`') and swap the positions of the top cable (color: `Color-1@spaceship`) and the second cable (color: `Color-2@spaceship`).
linear_guide: Explain the general situation to the robot and ask some question.
You just remember that this is the older version of the life support system. The second cable should be `Color-3@spaceship`!
Once the life support system is repaired (not earlier!), you can end the conversation.
completion_questions: Did the robot help successfully recover the life support?
Did the robot stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Act as the spaceship's onboard robot and help the user recover the life support.
